member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RelayISOx16
member.summary: A module that provides access to 16 optically-isolated relays for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

example.para: The following example uses a object to write to a few of the available 16 relays.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RelayISOx16.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RelayISOx16.EnableOutputs
member.summary: Enables the outputs to the relays.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RelayISOx16.DisableOutputs
member.summary: Disables the outputs to the relays.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RelayISOx16.EnableRelay(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Enables the relay that is passed in. Multiple relays can be enabled simultaneously.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.RelayISOx16.DisableRelay(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Disables the relay that is passed in. Multiple relays can be disabled simultaneously.
